title: The Closing Act (with Bell Ribeiro-Addy MP)
itunes:title: The Closing Act (with Bell Ribeiro-Addy MP)
description:
As the Conservatives close their conference in Manchester, Labour MP Bell Ribeiro-Addy says she's not worried Boris Johnson is stealing her party's clothes. But she tells Bloomberg Westminster's Roger Hearing and Yuan Potts that without radical policies, Labour risks being ignored.

Bloomberg Opinion Editor Therese Raphael joins to analyze Johnson's speech and assess the Tories' week.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
